gamelogic.gamestate

Class AdaptiveDifficulty

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamelogic.gamestate.AdaptiveDifficulty

  • public class AdaptiveDifficulty
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that keeps track of adaptive difficulty for a single user.
